scripts.compile: sass src/styles/style.scss src/dist/style.css & sass src/styles/mobile.scss src/dist/mobile.css
scripts.prod: sass src/styles/:src/dist && postcss src/dist/style.css src/dist/mobile.css --dir src/dist/ && purgecss --css src/dist/*.css --content src/**/*.html --output src/dist/ && postcss src/dist/mobile.css src/dist/style.css --dir src/dist/ --ext .min.css
